page.title: 10INDUSTRY MUSHROOM FARMING
page.content: {A&W MUSHROOMS Mr.Whittingham started growing mushrooms two years ago after leaving his other job.His farm is in two sheds which used to be for chickens.He decided to see if he could grow mushrooms for profit because he was interested in them when he was young.He now grows 48,000 pounds each year.It takes 8 to 10 weeks to grow them from bags which contain the spawn,lime,peat,compost and feeder. They need lots of water and a constant high temperature.Mr.Whittingham grows button mushrooms(Agricus Bipsorus). They are sold to wholesalers in Keighley and to some small shops.He has a part-time helper and the mushrooms are packed into 3 pound boxes.Mr.Whittingham thinks it is best for anyone wanting to grow mushrooms to work for someone else first.
